02170         res = ccn_connect(h, ccn_get_connect_type(orig_h));
02171         if (res < 0) {
02172             ccn_destroy(&h);
02173             return(-1);
02174         }
02175     }
02176     md = calloc(1, sizeof(*md));
02177     md->resultbuf = resultbuf;
02178     md->pcobuf = pcobuf;
02179     md->compsbuf = compsbuf;
02180     md->flags = flags;
02181     md->res = -1;
02182     md->closure.p = &handle_simple_incoming_content;
02183     md->closure.data = md;
02184     md->closure.intdata = 1; /* tell upcall to re-express if needed */
02185     md->closure.refcount = 1;
02186     res = ccn_express_interest(h, name, &md->closure, interest_template);
02187     if (res >= 0)
02188         res = ccn_run(h, timeout_ms);
02189     if (res >= 0)
02190         res = md->res;
02191     md->resultbuf = NULL;
02192     md->pcobuf = NULL;
02193     md->compsbuf = NULL;
02194     md->closure.intdata = 0;
02195     md->closure.refcount--;
02196     if (md->closure.refcount == 0)
02197         free(md);
02198     if (h != orig_h) {
02199         if (saved_keys != NULL)
02200             h->keys = saved_keys;
02201         ccn_destroy(&h);
02202     }
02203     return(res);
02204 }
02205 
02206 /**
02207  * Upcall to handle response to fetch a ccndid
02208  */
02209 static enum ccn_upcall_res
02210 handle_ccndid_response(struct ccn_closure *selfp,
02211                      enum ccn_upcall_kind kind,
02212                      struct ccn_upcall_info *info)
02213 {
02214     int res;
02215     const unsigned char *ccndid = NULL;
02216     size_t size = 0;
02217     struct ccn *h = info->h;
02218 
02219     if (kind == CCN_UPCALL_FINAL) {
02220         free(selfp);
02221         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
02222     }
02223     if (kind == CCN_UPCALL_CONTENT_UNVERIFIED)
02224         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_VERIFY);
02225     if (kind == CCN_UPCALL_CONTENT_KEYMISSING)
02226         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_FETCHKEY);
02227     if (kind == CCN_UPCALL_CONTENT_RAW) {
02228         if (ccn_verify_content(h, info->content_ccnb, info->pco) == 0)
02229             kind = CCN_UPCALL_CONTENT;
02230     }
02231     if (kind != CCN_UPCALL_CONTENT) {
02232         NOTE_ERR(h, -1000 - kind);
02233         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
02234     }
02235     res = ccn_ref_tagged_BLOB(CCN_DTAG_PublisherPublicKeyDigest,
02236                               info->content_ccnb,
02237                               info->pco->offset[CCN_PCO_B_PublisherPublicKeyDigest],
02238                               info->pco->offset[CCN_PCO_E_PublisherPublicKeyDigest],
02239                               &ccndid,
02240                               &size);
02241     if (res < 0) {
02242         NOTE_ERR(h, -1);
02243         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
02244     }
02245     if (h->ccndid == NULL) {
02246         h->ccndid = ccn_charbuf_create_n(size);
02247         if (h->ccndid == NULL)
02248             return(NOTE_ERRNO(h));
02249     }
02250     ccn_charbuf_reset(h->ccndid);
02251     ccn_charbuf_append(h->ccndid, ccndid, size);
02252     ccn_notify_ccndid_changed(h);
02253     return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
02254 }
02255 
02256 static void
02257 ccn_initiate_ccndid_fetch(struct ccn *h)
02258 {
02259     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
02260     struct ccn_closure *action = NULL;
02261 
02262     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
02263     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "ccnx:/%C1.M.S.localhost/%C1.M.SRV/ccnd/KEY");
02264     action = calloc(1, sizeof(*action));
02265     action->p = &handle_ccndid_response;
02266     ccn_express_interest(h, name, action, NULL);
02267     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
02268 }
02269 
02270 /**
02271  * Handle reply to a prefix registration request
02272  */
02273 static enum ccn_upcall_res
02274 handle_prefix_reg_reply(
02275     struct ccn_closure *selfp,
02276     enum ccn_upcall_kind kind,
02277     struct ccn_upcall_info *info)
02278 {
02279     struct ccn_reg_closure *md = selfp->data;
02280     struct ccn *h = info->h;
02281     int lifetime = 10;
02282     struct ccn_forwarding_entry *fe = NULL;
02283     int res;
02284     const unsigned char *fe_ccnb = NULL;
02285     size_t fe_ccnb_size = 0;
02286 
02287     if (kind == CCN_UPCALL_FINAL) {
02288         // fprintf(stderr, "GOT TO handle_prefix_reg_reply FINAL\n");
02289         if (selfp != &md->action)
02290             abort();
02291         if (md->interest_filter != NULL)
02292             md->interest_filter->ccn_reg_closure = NULL;
02293         selfp->data = NULL;
02294         free(md);
02295         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
02296     }
02297     if (kind == CCN_UPCALL_INTEREST_TIMED_OUT)
02298         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_REEXPRESS);
02299     if (kind == CCN_UPCALL_CONTENT_UNVERIFIED)
02300         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_VERIFY);
02301     if (kind == CCN_UPCALL_CONTENT_KEYMISSING)
02302         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_FETCHKEY);
02303     if (kind == CCN_UPCALL_CONTENT_RAW) {
02304         if (ccn_verify_content(h, info->content_ccnb, info->pco) == 0)
02305             kind = CCN_UPCALL_CONTENT;
02306     }
02307     if (kind != CCN_UPCALL_CONTENT) {
02308         NOTE_ERR(h, -1000 - kind);
02309         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
02310     }
02311     res = ccn_content_get_value(info->content_ccnb,
02312                                 info->pco->offset[CCN_PCO_E],
02313                                 info->pco,
02314                                 &fe_ccnb, &fe_ccnb_size);
02315     if (res == 0)
02316         fe = ccn_forwarding_entry_parse(fe_ccnb, fe_ccnb_size);
02317     if (fe == NULL) {
02318         XXX;
02319         lifetime = 30;
02320     }
02321     else
02322         lifetime = fe->lifetime;
02323     if (lifetime < 0)
02324         lifetime = 0;
02325     else if (lifetime > 3600)
02326         lifetime = 3600;
02327     if (md->interest_filter != NULL) {
02328         md->interest_filter->expiry = h->now;
02329         md->interest_filter->expiry.tv_sec += lifetime;
02330     }
02331     ccn_forwarding_entry_destroy(&fe);
02332     return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
02333 }
02334 
02335 static void
02336 ccn_initiate_prefix_reg(struct ccn *h,
02337                         const void *prefix, size_t prefix_size,
02338                         struct interest_filter *i)
02339 {
02340     struct ccn_reg_closure *p = NULL;
02341     struct ccn_charbuf *reqname = NULL;
02342     struct ccn_charbuf *templ = NULL;
02343     struct ccn_forwarding_entry fe_store = { 0 };
02344     struct ccn_forwarding_entry *fe = &fe_store;
02345     struct ccn_charbuf *reg_request = NULL;
02346     struct ccn_charbuf *signed_reg_request = NULL;
02347     struct ccn_charbuf *empty = NULL;
02348 
02349     i->expiry = h->now;
02350     i->expiry.tv_sec += 60;
02351     /* This test is mainly for the benefit of the ccnd internal client */
02352     if (h->sock == -1)
02353         return;
02354     // fprintf(stderr, "GOT TO STUB ccn_initiate_prefix_reg()\n");
02355     if (h->ccndid == NULL) {
02356         ccn_initiate_ccndid_fetch(h);
02357         i->flags |= CCN_FORW_WAITING_CCNDID;
02358         return;
02359     }
02360     if (i->ccn_reg_closure != NULL)
02361         return;
02362     p = calloc(1, sizeof(*p));
02363     if (p == NULL) {
02364         NOTE_ERRNO(h);
02365         return;
02366     }
02367     p->action.data = p;
02368     p->action.p = &handle_prefix_reg_reply;
02369     p->interest_filter = i;
02370     i->ccn_reg_closure = p;
02371     reqname = ccn_charbuf_create();
02372     ccn_name_from_uri(reqname, "ccnx:/ccnx");
02373     ccn_name_append(reqname, h->ccndid->buf, h->ccndid->length);
02374     ccn_name_append_str(reqname, "selfreg");
02375     fe->action = "selfreg";
02376     fe->ccnd_id = h->ccndid->buf;
02377     fe->ccnd_id_size = h->ccndid->length;
02378     fe->faceid = ~0; // XXX - someday explicit faceid may be required
02379     fe->name_prefix = ccn_charbuf_create();
02380     fe->flags = i->flags & 0xFF;
02381     fe->lifetime = -1; /* Let ccnd decide */
02382     ccn_name_init(fe->name_prefix);
02383     ccn_name_append_components(fe->name_prefix, prefix, 0, prefix_size);
02384     reg_request = ccn_charbuf_create();
02385     ccnb_append_forwarding_entry(reg_request, fe);
02386     empty = ccn_charbuf_create();
02387     ccn_name_init(empty);
02388     signed_reg_request = ccn_charbuf_create();
02389     ccn_sign_content(h, signed_reg_request, empty, NULL,
02390                      reg_request->buf, reg_request->length);
02391     ccn_name_append(reqname,
02392                     signed_reg_request->buf, signed_reg_request->length);
02393     // XXX - should set up templ for scope 1
02394     ccn_express_interest(h, reqname, &p->action, templ);
02395     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&fe->name_prefix);
02396     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&reqname);
02397     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&templ);
02398     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&reg_request);
02399     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&signed_reg_request);
02400     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&empty);
02401 }
02402 
02403 /**
02404  * Verify a ContentObject using the public key from either the object
02405  * itself or our cache of keys.
02406  *
02407  * This routine does not attempt to fetch the public key if it is not
02408  * at hand.
02409  * @returns negative for error, 0 verification success,
02410  *         or 1 if the key needs to be requested.
02411  */
02412 int
02413 ccn_verify_content(struct ccn *h,
02414                    const unsigned char *msg,
02415                    struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject *pco)
02416 {
02417     struct ccn_pkey *pubkey = NULL;
02418     int res;
02419     unsigned char *buf = (unsigned char *)msg; /* XXX - discard const */
02420 
02421     res = ccn_locate_key(h, msg, pco, &pubkey);
02422     if (res == 0) {
02423         /* we have the pubkey, use it to verify the msg */
02424         res = ccn_verify_signature(buf, pco->offset[CCN_PCO_E], pco, pubkey);
02425         res = (res == 1) ? 0 : -1;
02426     }
02427     return(res);
02428 }
02429 
02430 /**
02431  * Load a private key from a keystore file.
02432  *
02433  * This call is only required for applications that use something other
02434  * than the user's default signing key.
02435  * @param h is the ccn handle
02436  * @param keystore_path is the pathname of the keystore file
02437  * @param keystore_passphrase is the passphase needed to unlock the keystore
02438  * @param pubid_out, if not NULL, is loaded with the digest of the public key
02439  * @result is 0 for success, negative for error.
02440  */
02441 int
02442 ccn_load_private_key(struct ccn *h,
02443                      const char *keystore_path,
02444                      const char *keystore_passphrase,
02445                      struct ccn_charbuf *pubid_out)
02446 {
02447     struct ccn_keystore *keystore = NULL;
02448     int res = 0;
02449     struct ccn_charbuf *pubid = pubid_out;
02450     struct ccn_charbuf *pubid_store = NULL;
02451     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
02452     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
02453 
02454     if (pubid == NULL)
02455         pubid = pubid_store = ccn_charbuf_create();
02456     if (pubid == NULL) {
02457         res = NOTE_ERRNO(h);
02458         goto Cleanup;
02459     }
02460     keystore = ccn_keystore_create();
02461     if (keystore == NULL) {
02462         res = NOTE_ERRNO(h);
02463         goto Cleanup;
02464     }
02465     res = ccn_keystore_init(keystore,
02466                            (char *)keystore_path,
02467                            (char *)keystore_passphrase);
02468     if (res != 0) {
02469         res = NOTE_ERRNO(h);
02470         goto Cleanup;
02471     }
02472     pubid->length = 0;
02473     ccn_charbuf_append(pubid,
02474                        ccn_keystore_public_key_digest(keystore),
02475                        ccn_keystore_public_key_digest_length(keystore));
02476     hashtb_start(h->keystores, e);
02477     res = hashtb_seek(e, pubid->buf, pubid->length, 0);
02478     if (res == HT_NEW_ENTRY) {
02479         struct ccn_keystore **p = e->data;
02480         *p = keystore;
02481         keystore = NULL;
02482         res = 0;
02483     }
02484     else if (res == HT_OLD_ENTRY)
02485         res = 0;
02486     else
02487         res = NOTE_ERRNO(h);
02488     hashtb_end(e);
02489 Cleanup:
02490     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&pubid_store);
02491     ccn_keystore_destroy(&keystore);
02492     return(res);
02493 }
02494 
02495 /**
02496  * Load the handle's default signing key from a keystore.
02497  *
02498  * This call is only required for applications that use something other
02499  * than the user's default signing key as the handle's default.  It should
02500  * be called early and at most once.
02501  * @param h is the ccn handle
02502  * @param keystore_path is the pathname of the keystore file
02503  * @param keystore_passphrase is the passphase needed to unlock the keystore
02504  * @result is 0 for success, negative for error.
02505  */
02506 int
02507 ccn_load_default_key(struct ccn *h,
02508                      const char *keystore_path,
02509                      const char *keystore_passphrase)
02510 {
02511     struct ccn_charbuf *default_pubid = NULL;
02512     int res;
02513 
02514     if (h->default_pubid != NULL)
02515         return(NOTE_ERR(h, EINVAL));
02516     default_pubid = ccn_charbuf_create();
02517     if (default_pubid == NULL)
02518         return(NOTE_ERRNO(h));
02519     res = ccn_load_private_key(h,
02520                                keystore_path,
02521                                keystore_passphrase,
02522                                default_pubid);
02523     if (res == 0)
02524         h->default_pubid = default_pubid;
02525     else
02526         ccn_charbuf_destroy(&default_pubid);
02527     return(res);
02528 }
02529 
02530 static void
02531 finalize_keystore(struct hashtb_enumerator *e)
02532 {
02533     struct ccn_keystore **p = e->data;
02534     ccn_keystore_destroy(p);
02535 }
02536 
02537 /**
02538  * Place the public key associated with the params into result
02539  * buffer, and its digest into digest_result.
02540  *
02541  * This is for one of our signing keys, not just any key.
02542  * Result buffers may be NULL if the corresponding result is not wanted.
02543  *
02544  * @returns 0 for success, negative for error
02545  */
02546 int
02547 ccn_get_public_key(struct ccn *h,
02548                    const struct ccn_signing_params *params,
02549                    struct ccn_charbuf *digest_result,
02550                    struct ccn_charbuf *result)
02551 {
02552     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
02553     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
02554     struct ccn_keystore *keystore = NULL;
02555     struct ccn_signing_params sp = CCN_SIGNING_PARAMS_INIT;
02556     int res;
02557     res = ccn_chk_signing_params(h, params, &sp, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
02558     if (res < 0)
02559         return(res);
02560     hashtb_start(h->keystores, e);
02561     if (hashtb_seek(e, sp.pubid, sizeof(sp.pubid), 0) == HT_OLD_ENTRY) {
02562         struct ccn_keystore **pk = e->data;
02563         keystore = *pk;
02564         if (digest_result != NULL) {
02565             digest_result->length = 0;
02566             ccn_charbuf_append(digest_result,
02567                                ccn_keystore_public_key_digest(keystore),
02568                                ccn_keystore_public_key_digest_length(keystore));
02569         }
02570         if (result != NULL) {
02571             struct ccn_buf_decoder decoder;
02572             struct ccn_buf_decoder *d;
02573             const unsigned char *p;
02574             size_t size;
02575             result->length = 0;
02576             ccn_append_pubkey_blob(result, ccn_keystore_public_key(keystore));
02577             d = ccn_buf_decoder_start(&decoder, result->buf, result->length);
02578             res = ccn_buf_match_blob(d, &p, &size);
02579             if (res >= 0) {
02580                 memmove(result->buf, p, size);
02581                 result->length = size;
02582                 res = 0;
02583             }
02584         }
02585     }
02586     else {
02587         res = NOTE_ERR(h, -1);
02588         hashtb_delete(e);
02589     }
02590     hashtb_end(e);
02591     return(res);
02592 }
02593 
02594 static int
02595 ccn_load_or_create_key(struct ccn *h,
02596                        const char *keystore,
02597                        struct ccn_charbuf *pubid)
02598 {
02599     const char *password;
02600     int res;
02601     
02602     password = getenv("CCNX_KEYSTORE_PASSWORD");
02603     if (password == 0)
02604         password = "Th1s1sn0t8g00dp8ssw0rd.";
02605     res = ccn_load_private_key(h, keystore, password, pubid);
02606     if (res != 0) {
02607         /* Either file exists and password is wrong or file does not exist */
02608         if (access(keystore, R_OK) == 0) {
02609             fprintf(stderr,
02610                "Keystore file [%s] exists, but private key cannot be loaded.\n"
02611                "Check if CCNX_KEYSTORE_PASSWORD is set to a correct password,\n"
02612                "otherwise remove [%s] and it will be automatically created.\n",
02613                keystore, keystore);
02614             return(res);
02615         }
02616         fprintf(stderr,
02617             "Keystore [%s] does not exist and will be automatically created\n",
02618             keystore);
02619         res = ccn_keystore_file_init((char*)keystore, (char*)password,
02620                 "ccnxuser", 0, 3650); /* create a key valid for 10 years */
02621         if (res != 0) {
02622             fprintf(stderr, "Cannot create keystore [%s]\n", keystore);
02623             res = NOTE_ERRNO(h);
02624             return(res);
02625         }
02626         res = ccn_load_private_key(h, keystore, password, pubid);
02627     }
02628     return(res);
02629 }
02630 
02631 static int
02632 ccn_load_or_create_default_key(struct ccn *h)
02633 {
02634     const char *s = NULL;
02635     struct ccn_charbuf *path = NULL;
02636     struct ccn_charbuf *default_pubid = NULL;
02637     int res = 0;
02638     
02639     if (h->default_pubid != NULL)
02640         return(0);
02641     
02642     path = ccn_charbuf_create();
02643     default_pubid = ccn_charbuf_create();
02644     if (default_pubid == NULL || path == NULL)
02645         return(NOTE_ERRNO(h));
02646     s = getenv("CCNX_DIR");
02647     if (s != NULL && s[0] != 0)
02648         ccn_charbuf_putf(path, "%s", s);
02649     else {
02650         s = getenv("HOME");
02651         if (s != NULL && s[0] != 0) {
02652             ccn_charbuf_putf(path, "%s/.ccnx", s);
02653             res = mkdir(ccn_charbuf_as_string(path), S_IRWXU);
02654             if (res == -1) {
02655                 if (errno == EEXIST)
02656                     res = 0;
02657                 else
02658                     res = NOTE_ERRNO(h);
02659             }
02660         }
02661         else
02662             res = NOTE_ERR(h, -1);
02663     }
02664     ccn_charbuf_putf(path, "/%s", ".ccnx_keystore");
02665     res = ccn_load_or_create_key(h,
02666                                  ccn_charbuf_as_string(path),
02667                                  default_pubid);
02668     if (res == 0) {
02669         h->default_pubid = default_pubid;
02670         default_pubid = NULL;
02671     }
02672     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&default_pubid);
02673     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&path);
02674     return(res);
02675 }
02676 
02677 /**
02678  * This is mostly for use within the library,
02679  * but may be useful for some clients.
02680  */
02681 int
02682 ccn_chk_signing_params(struct ccn *h,
02683                        const struct ccn_signing_params *params,
02684                        struct ccn_signing_params *result,
02685                        struct ccn_charbuf **ptimestamp,
02686                        struct ccn_charbuf **pfinalblockid,
02687                        struct ccn_charbuf **pkeylocator,
02688                        struct ccn_charbuf **pextopt)
02689 {
02690     int res = 0;
02691     int i;
02692     int conflicting;
02693     int needed;
02694 
02695     if (params != NULL)
02696         *result = *params;
02697     if ((result->sp_flags & ~(CCN_SP_TEMPL_TIMESTAMP      |
02698                               CCN_SP_TEMPL_FINAL_BLOCK_ID |
02699                               CCN_SP_TEMPL_FRESHNESS      |
02700                               CCN_SP_TEMPL_KEY_LOCATOR    |
02701                               CCN_SP_FINAL_BLOCK          |
02702                               CCN_SP_OMIT_KEY_LOCATOR     |
02703                               CCN_SP_TEMPL_EXT_OPT
02704                               )) != 0)
02705         return(NOTE_ERR(h, EINVAL));
02706     conflicting = CCN_SP_TEMPL_FINAL_BLOCK_ID | CCN_SP_FINAL_BLOCK;
02707     if ((result->sp_flags & conflicting) == conflicting)
02708         return(NOTE_ERR(h, EINVAL));
02709     conflicting = CCN_SP_TEMPL_KEY_LOCATOR | CCN_SP_OMIT_KEY_LOCATOR;
02710         if ((result->sp_flags & conflicting) == conflicting)
02711         return(NOTE_ERR(h, EINVAL));
02712     for (i = 0; i < sizeof(result->pubid) && result->pubid[i] == 0; i++)
02713         continue;
02714     if (i == sizeof(result->pubid)) {
02715         if (h->default_pubid == NULL) {
02716             res = ccn_load_or_create_default_key(h);
02717             if (res < 0)
02718                 return(res);
02719         }
02720         memcpy(result->pubid, h->default_pubid->buf, sizeof(result->pubid));
02721     }
02722     needed = result->sp_flags & (CCN_SP_TEMPL_TIMESTAMP      |
02723                                  CCN_SP_TEMPL_FINAL_BLOCK_ID |
02724                                  CCN_SP_TEMPL_FRESHNESS      |
02725                                  CCN_SP_TEMPL_KEY_LOCATOR    |
02726                                  CCN_SP_TEMPL_EXT_OPT        );
02727     if (result->template_ccnb != NULL) {
02728         struct ccn_buf_decoder decoder;
02729         struct ccn_buf_decoder *d;
02730         size_t start;
02731         size_t stop;
02732         size_t size;
02733         const unsigned char *ptr = NULL;
02734         d = ccn_buf_decoder_start(&decoder,
02735                                   result->template_ccnb->buf,
02736                                   result->template_ccnb->length);
02737         if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_SignedInfo)) {
02738             ccn_buf_advance(d);
02739             if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_PublisherPublicKeyDigest))
02740                 ccn_parse_required_tagged_BLOB(d,
02741                     CCN_DTAG_PublisherPublicKeyDigest, 16, 64);
02742             start = d->decoder.token_index;
02743             ccn_parse_optional_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_Timestamp, 1, -1);
02744             stop = d->decoder.token_index;
02745             if ((needed & CCN_SP_TEMPL_TIMESTAMP) != 0) {
02746                 i = ccn_ref_tagged_BLOB(CCN_DTAG_Timestamp,
02747                                         d->buf,
02748                                         start, stop,
02749                                         &ptr, &size);
02750                 if (i == 0) {
02751                     if (ptimestamp != NULL) {
02752                         *ptimestamp = ccn_charbuf_create();
02753                         ccn_charbuf_append(*ptimestamp, ptr, size);
02754                     }
02755                     needed &= ~CCN_SP_TEMPL_TIMESTAMP;
02756                 }
02757             }
02758             ccn_parse_optional_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_Type, 1, -1);
02759             i = ccn_parse_optional_tagged_nonNegativeInteger(d,
02760                     CCN_DTAG_FreshnessSeconds);
02761             if ((needed & CCN_SP_TEMPL_FRESHNESS) != 0 && i >= 0) {
02762                 result->freshness = i;
02763                 needed &= ~CCN_SP_TEMPL_FRESHNESS;
02764             }
02765             if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_FinalBlockID)) {
02766                 ccn_buf_advance(d);
02767                 start = d->decoder.token_index;
02768                 if (ccn_buf_match_some_blob(d))
02769                     ccn_buf_advance(d);
02770                 stop = d->decoder.token_index;
02771                 ccn_buf_check_close(d);
02772                 if ((needed & CCN_SP_TEMPL_FINAL_BLOCK_ID) != 0 && 
02773                     d->decoder.state >= 0 && stop > start) {
02774                     if (pfinalblockid != NULL) {
02775                         *pfinalblockid = ccn_charbuf_create();
02776                         ccn_charbuf_append(*pfinalblockid,
02777                                            d->buf + start, stop - start);
02778                     }
02779                     needed &= ~CCN_SP_TEMPL_FINAL_BLOCK_ID;
02780                 }
02781             }
02782             start = d->decoder.token_index;
02783             if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_KeyLocator))
02784                 ccn_buf_advance_past_element(d);
02785             stop = d->decoder.token_index;
02786             if ((needed & CCN_SP_TEMPL_KEY_LOCATOR) != 0 && 
02787                 d->decoder.state >= 0 && stop > start) {
02788                 if (pkeylocator != NULL) {
02789                     *pkeylocator = ccn_charbuf_create();
02790                     ccn_charbuf_append(*pkeylocator,
02791                                        d->buf + start, stop - start);
02792                 }
02793                 needed &= ~CCN_SP_TEMPL_KEY_LOCATOR;
02794             }
02795             start = d->decoder.token_index;
02796             if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_ExtOpt))
02797                 ccn_buf_advance_past_element(d);
02798             stop = d->decoder.token_index;
02799             if ((needed & CCN_SP_TEMPL_EXT_OPT) != 0 && 
02800                 d->decoder.state >= 0 && stop > start) {
02801                 if (pextopt != NULL) {
02802                     *pextopt = ccn_charbuf_create();
02803                     ccn_charbuf_append(*pextopt,
02804                                        d->buf + start, stop - start);
02805                 }
02806                 needed &= ~CCN_SP_TEMPL_EXT_OPT;
02807             }
02808             ccn_buf_check_close(d);
02809         }
02810         if (d->decoder.state < 0)
02811             res = NOTE_ERR(h, EINVAL);
02812     }
02813     if (needed != 0)
02814         res = NOTE_ERR(h, EINVAL);
02815     return(res);
02816 }
02817 
02818 /**
02819  * Create a signed ContentObject.
02820  *
02821  * @param h is the ccn handle
02822  * @param resultbuf - result buffer to which the ContentObject will be appended
02823  * @param name_prefix contains the ccnb-encoded name
02824  * @param params describe the ancillary information needed
02825  * @param data points to the raw content
02826  * @param size is the size of the raw content, in bytes
02827  * @returns 0 for success, -1 for error
02828  */
02829 int
02830 ccn_sign_content(struct ccn *h,
02831                  struct ccn_charbuf *resultbuf,
02832                  const struct ccn_charbuf *name_prefix,
02833                  const struct ccn_signing_params *params,
02834                  const void *data, size_t size)
02835 {
02836     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
02837     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
02838     struct ccn_signing_params p = CCN_SIGNING_PARAMS_INIT;
02839     struct ccn_charbuf *signed_info = NULL;
02840     struct ccn_keystore *keystore = NULL;
02841     struct ccn_charbuf *timestamp = NULL;
02842     struct ccn_charbuf *finalblockid = NULL;
02843     struct ccn_charbuf *keylocator = NULL;
02844     struct ccn_charbuf *extopt = NULL;
02845     int res;
02846 
02847     res = ccn_chk_signing_params(h, params, &p,
02848                                  &timestamp, &finalblockid, &keylocator, &extopt);
02849     if (res < 0)
02850         return(res);
02851     hashtb_start(h->keystores, e);
02852     if (hashtb_seek(e, p.pubid, sizeof(p.pubid), 0) == HT_OLD_ENTRY) {
02853         struct ccn_keystore **pk = e->data;
02854         keystore = *pk;
02855         signed_info = ccn_charbuf_create();
02856         if (keylocator == NULL && (p.sp_flags & CCN_SP_OMIT_KEY_LOCATOR) == 0) {
02857             /* Construct a key locator containing the key itself */
02858             keylocator = ccn_charbuf_create();
02859             ccn_charbuf_append_tt(keylocator, CCN_DTAG_KeyLocator, CCN_DTAG);
02860             ccn_charbuf_append_tt(keylocator, CCN_DTAG_Key, CCN_DTAG);
02861             res = ccn_append_pubkey_blob(keylocator,
02862                                          ccn_keystore_public_key(keystore));
02863             ccn_charbuf_append_closer(keylocator); /* </Key> */
02864             ccn_charbuf_append_closer(keylocator); /* </KeyLocator> */
02865         }
02866         if (res >= 0 && (p.sp_flags & CCN_SP_FINAL_BLOCK) != 0) {
02867             int ncomp;
02868             struct ccn_indexbuf *ndx;
02869             const unsigned char *comp = NULL;
02870             size_t size = 0;
02871 
02872             ndx = ccn_indexbuf_create();
02873             ncomp = ccn_name_split(name_prefix, ndx);
02874             if (ncomp < 0)
02875                 res = NOTE_ERR(h, EINVAL);
02876             else {
02877                 finalblockid = ccn_charbuf_create();
02878                 ccn_name_comp_get(name_prefix->buf,
02879                                   ndx, ncomp - 1, &comp, &size);
02880                 ccn_charbuf_append_tt(finalblockid, size, CCN_BLOB);
02881                 ccn_charbuf_append(finalblockid, comp, size);
02882             }
02883             ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&ndx);
02884         }
02885         if (res >= 0)
02886             res = ccn_signed_info_create(signed_info,
02887                                          ccn_keystore_public_key_digest(keystore),
02888                                          ccn_keystore_public_key_digest_length(keystore),
02889                                          timestamp,
02890                                          p.type,
02891                                          p.freshness,
02892                                          finalblockid,
02893                                          keylocator);
02894         if (res >= 0 && extopt != NULL) {
02895             /* ExtOpt not currently part of ccn_signed_info_create */
02896             if (signed_info->length > 0 &&
02897                 signed_info->buf[signed_info->length - 1] == 0) {
02898                 signed_info->length -= 1; /* remove closer */
02899                 ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(signed_info, extopt);
02900                 ccn_charbuf_append_closer(signed_info);
02901             }
02902             else
02903                 NOTE_ERR(h, -1);
02904         }
02905         if (res >= 0)
02906             res = ccn_encode_ContentObject(resultbuf,
02907                                            name_prefix,
02908                                            signed_info,
02909                                            data,
02910                                            size,
02911                                            ccn_keystore_digest_algorithm(keystore),
02912                                            ccn_keystore_private_key(keystore));
02913     }
02914     else {
02915         res = NOTE_ERR(h, -1);
02916         hashtb_delete(e);
02917     }
02918     hashtb_end(e);
02919     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&timestamp);
02920     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&keylocator);
02921     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&finalblockid);
02922     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&signed_info);
02923     return(res);
02924 }
02925 /**
02926  * Check whether content described by info is final block.
02927  *
02928  * @param info - the ccn_upcall_info describing the ContentObject
02929  * @returns 1 for final block, 0 for not final, -1 if an error occurs
02930  */
02931 int
02932 ccn_is_final_block(struct ccn_upcall_info *info)
02933 {
02934     return (ccn_is_final_pco(info->content_ccnb, info->pco, info->content_comps));
02935 }
02936 
02937 /**
02938  * Given a ccnb encoded content object, the parsed form, and name components
02939  * report whether this is the last (FinalBlockID) segment of a stream.
02940  * @param ccnb - a ccnb encoded content object
02941  * @param pco - the parsed content object
02942  * @param comps - an indexbuf locating the components of the name
02943  * @returns 1 for final block, 0 for not final, or -1 for error.
02944  */
02945 int
02946 ccn_is_final_pco(const unsigned char *ccnb,
02947                     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject *pco,
02948                     struct ccn_indexbuf *comps)
02949 {
02950     if (ccnb == NULL || pco == NULL)
02951         return(0);
02952     if (pco->offset[CCN_PCO_B_FinalBlockID] !=
02953         pco->offset[CCN_PCO_E_FinalBlockID]) {
02954         const unsigned char *finalid = NULL;
02955         size_t finalid_size = 0;
02956         const unsigned char *nameid = NULL;
02957         size_t nameid_size = 0;
02958         ccn_ref_tagged_BLOB(CCN_DTAG_FinalBlockID, ccnb,
02959                             pco->offset[CCN_PCO_B_FinalBlockID],
02960                             pco->offset[CCN_PCO_E_FinalBlockID],
02961                             &finalid,
02962                             &finalid_size);
02963         if (comps->n < 2) return(-1);
02964         ccn_ref_tagged_BLOB(CCN_DTAG_Component, ccnb,
02965                             comps->buf[comps->n - 2],
02966                             comps->buf[comps->n - 1],
02967                             &nameid,
02968                             &nameid_size);
02969         if (finalid_size == nameid_size &&
02970             0 == memcmp(finalid, nameid, nameid_size))
02971             return(1);
02972     }
02973     return(0);
02974 }
02975 
02976 /**
02977  * Ask upstream for a guest prefix that will be routed to us.
02978  *
02979  * On success, the prefix is placed into result, in the form of a uri.
02980  * ms is the maximum time to wait for an answer.
02981  *
02982  * @result is 0 for success, or -1 for failure.
02983  */
02984 int
02985 ccn_guest_prefix(struct ccn *h, struct ccn_charbuf *result, int ms)
02986 {
02987     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pco = {0};
02988     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
02989     struct ccn_charbuf *templ = NULL;
02990     struct ccn_charbuf *cob = NULL;
02991     const unsigned char *p = NULL;
02992     unsigned char me[] = "\xC1.M.K\x00XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX";
02993     size_t p_size;
02994     int res;
02995     
02996     if (h->ccndid == NULL) {
02997         ccn_initiate_ccndid_fetch(h);
02998         ccn_run(h, (ms < 400) ? ms / 2 : 200);
02999     }
03000     if (h->ccndid == NULL)
03001         return(-1);
03002     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
03003     if (name == NULL)
03004         return(-1);
03005     cob = ccn_charbuf_create();
03006     if (cob == NULL)
03007         goto Bail;
03008     res = ccn_name_from_uri(name, "ccnx:/%C1.M.S.neighborhood/guest");
03009     if (res < 0)
03010         goto Bail;
03011     memcpy(me + 6, h->ccndid->buf, 32);
03012     res = ccn_name_append(name, me, 6 + 32);
03013     if (res < 0)
03014         goto Bail;
03015     templ = ccn_charbuf_create();
03016     if (templ == NULL)
03017         goto Bail;
03018     ccn_charbuf_append_tt(templ, CCN_DTAG_Interest, CCN_DTAG);
03019     ccn_charbuf_append_tt(templ, CCN_DTAG_Name, CCN_DTAG);
03020     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(templ); /* </Name> */
03021     ccnb_tagged_putf(templ, CCN_DTAG_Scope, "%d", 2);
03022     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(templ); /* </Interest> */
03023     res = ccn_resolve_version(h, name, CCN_V_HIGHEST, ms);
03024     if (res < 0)
03025         goto Bail;
03026     res = ccn_get(h, name, templ, ms, cob, &pco, NULL, 0);
03027     if (res < 0)
03028         goto Bail;
03029     if (result != NULL) {
03030         ccn_charbuf_reset(result);
03031         res = ccn_content_get_value(cob->buf, cob->length, &pco, &p, &p_size);
03032         if (res < 0)
03033             goto Bail;
03034         res = ccn_charbuf_append(result, p, p_size);
03035     }
03036 Bail:
03037     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
03038     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&cob);
03039     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&templ);
03040     return((res < 0) ? -1 : 0);
03041 }
